concept.title: Developer Guide
concept.shortdesc: Technical documentation for developers contributing to or extending Lingua Workbench.

section.title: About This Guide
section.p: This section contains architecture documentation, component designs, and implementation details intended for developers working on the Lingua Workbench codebase.
section.note: This documentation is intended for developers only. End users should refer to the main user guide.

section.title: Frontend Components
section.p: Key Vue components and their architecture:

ul.li: BaseWaveSurfer - Audio waveform visualization and region management
AudioSlicer - Region selection workspace and slice persistence
SliceCard - Audio slice editing with highlighting and AI analysis
useHighlightSelection - Text selection and highlight creation
